tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodiversity_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name TEXT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    threat_level TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DeforestationEffects (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Location VARCHAR(255),
  DeforestationArea FLOAT,
  BiodiversityImpact VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE BiodiversityData (
  SpeciesID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  SpeciesName VARCHAR(255),
  Habitat VARCHAR(255),
  ThreatenedStatus VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SpatialData (
  LocationID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  Longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
  Elevation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ForestRegions (
  RegionID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  RegionName VARCHAR(100),
  VegetationType VARCHAR(50),
  RegionArea FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE species_table (species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name TEXT, species_category TEXT, location_point GEOMETRY, extinction_status BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE forest_table (forest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, forest_name TEXT, forest_area FLOAT, location_polygon GEOMETRY)
CREATE TABLE deforestation_table (deforestation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, forest_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE biodiversity_table (species_id INT, forest_id INT, biodiversity_index FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE climate_table (forest_id INT, temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT)
